description:
Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Abkhaz, Acehnese, Acholi, Afar, Afrikaans, Albanian, Alur, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Avar, Awadhi, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Balinese, Baluchi, Bambara, Baoulé, Bashkir, Basque, Batak Karo, developer: Turkiye Cumhuriyeti Cumhurbaskanlıgı Dijital Donusum Ofisi Baskanlıgı
description:
Yeni e-Devlet Kapısı iOS uygulaması ile www.turkiye.gov.tr adresindeki hizmetler artık mobil cihazınızda.
 
Uygulamayı kullanabilmek için e-Devlet Şifresi veya Mobil İmza sahibi olmalısınız. e-Devlet Şifrenizi PTT şubelerine geçerli kimliğiniz ile birlikte şahsen başvurarak temin edebilirsiniz. Mobil İmza aboneliği için hizmet aldığınız operatöre başvurmalı ve gerekli prosedürü tamamlamalısınız.

Uygulamayla, www.turkiye.gov.tr adresinde en sık kullanılan hizmetleri kullanabilir, favori hizmetlerinizi görebilir, profil bilgilerinizi düzenleyebilir, anlık bildirim alabilir, kamu kurumları ve belediyelere ait bilgi ve hizmetlere hızlı bir şekilde ulaşabilirsiniz.

 
En Sık Kullanılan Hizmetler

- SGK 4A Hizmet Dökümü
- Adalet Bakanlığı Mahkeme Dava Sorgulama
- Gelir İdaresi Başkanlığı Vergi Borcu Sorgulama
- SGK GSS Prim Borcu Sorgulama
- Maliye Bakanlığı e-Bordro Hizmeti

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.


Unlock the full Muslim Pro Experience with Premium
Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted access to all features.
Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Premium Subscription Plans
$12.99 per month
$34.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing may vary in other countries, and charges may be converted to your local currency.
Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in your Apple account.

Supported Languages
Muslim Pro is available in multiple languages, including English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Français, العربية, اردو, and more.

Pro Tips for the Best Experience:
Keep the app updated for the most accurate prayer times and reading features.
Enable auto-location to adjust prayer notifications based on your area.
Open the app daily for seamless access to verified prayer times, Qibla tools, a prayer space finder, and a Halal restaurant finder.

Download Muslim Pro today and elevate your experience!

InstantTranslator: AI Translate – Translate with Spanish, Japanese and other languages!

Translate Text, Picture & Camera Instantly – Anytime, Anywhere!

InstantTranslator is a powerful AI-driven translation app designed to break language barriers effortlessly. Whether you're traveling, studying, working, or chatting with international friends, our smart translator makes communication easy and seamless. With support for over 20 languages, including Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, and more, you can instantly translate text, speech, and images with high accuracy.

Now with Picture-in-Picture Subtitle Translation – Perfect for Watching Shows!
Enjoy your favorite foreign-language videos with real-time subtitle translation in a floating window. Whether you’re streaming drama, tutorials, or YouTube clips, our PiP mode helps you understand without switching screens.

[Key Features]
• Text Translator
Powered by Microsoft and ChatGPT engines, translate written content between multiple languages. Ideal for documents, emails, chats, and webpages with one-tap accuracy.

• Voice & Speech Translator
AI-powered speech recognition instantly translates spoken words. Perfect for conversations, meetings, and travel.

• Camera & Photo Translator
Capture text from signs, menus, or documents and receive instant translations. Eliminate language barriers while traveling.

• Picture-in-Picture Subtitle Translation
Watch videos in other languages while a floating translation box displays subtitles in real time. Great for learning and entertainment.

• Live Conversation Mode
Real-time two-way translation for fluid bilingual communication.

• Document & PDF Translator
Full document translation for PDFs, papers, and files. Essential for students and professionals.

• Multi-Language Support
Supports Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese (Simplified & Cantonese), Tagalog, Vietnamese, Arabic, French, Russian, Portuguese, German, Greek, Hebrew, Italian, Polish, Thai, Haitian Creole, and more. Powered by DeepSeek, Google, ChatGPT, and Microsoft.

• Speed & Privacy
Instant translations with widget access. Ad-free experience with strict data protection.

[Use Cases]

Travel: Translate menus, signs, and hotel info

Business: Communicate with global partners

Education: Study foreign materials instantly

Daily Life: Multilingual chats with friends

Entertainment: Translate subtitles while watching foreign shows in real time

[Why Choose Us?]
• Advanced AI translation accuracy
• Instant text/speech/image results
• Picture-in-picture subtitle support
• Offline translation capability

Download Now to experience borderless communication — even while watching your favorite shows!

Subscriptions  
Weekly: $9.99 | Annual: $34.99  
Auto-renewal can be managed in account settings.
Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in your account settings after purchase.

Terms of Use: https://instanttranslator-6e103.web.app/term_of_use.txt

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Start using Voice Translator now and forget about looking for the correct phrase in the dictionary – say any phrase and your interpreter will pronounce the translation out loud!

Features:
– Immediate translation of real-time conversations
– Use your camera for instant text translation
– Translate texts from your photos and pics
– Translate as you type in any of your favorite messaging apps
– Extended offline phrasebook
– Language detection for text-to-text mode
– 100+ languages working in speech-to-speech and text-to-text modes
– You can either speak or type to translate your text
– Smart text-to-text mode
– Speed up your text input with typing hints
– Convert text from languages with non-Latin alphabet
– Copy, paste and share translations in a single tap
– Intuitive dialogue conversation interface
– Speak the translated phrase out loud
– Control the speed of voice
– Male and female voices available
– Human-to-Pet and Pet-to-Human modes (for entertainment purposes only). Translate your pet’s meow or woof into your language.

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bashkir, Belarussian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Burmese, Bosnian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), English, Esperanto, Estonian, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lao, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Scots, Singhalese, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakutian, Yiddish, Zulu.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Sürücülük vəsiqəsi imtahanına hazırlıq üçün köməkçi Yol nişanları proqramı

Sürücülük vəsiqəsi imtahanına hazırlıq üçün Yol nişanları proqramı Azərbaycan Respublikasında yollardakı bütün yol nişanlarını və izahlarını öyrədən tətbiqdir. Tətbiq içində test edərək öyrəndiklərinizi yoxlaya bilərsiniz.

Tətbiqdəki nişanlar və izahları DYP-nin saytından götürülüb və müntəzəm olaraq yenilənir.

Tətbiqi birbaşa sürücülük vəsiqəsi üçün imtahana hazırlıq üçün yox, köməkçi kimi istifadə etmək daha uyğundur. Proqramdan istifadə edərək yol hərəkət qaydalarını və yol nişanlarını daha yaxşı öyrənə və sürücülük vəsiqəsi almaq üçün sürücülük ("prava") imtahanında faydalana bilərsiniz. Həmçinin, nişanları öyrənərək yol polisinin sizi saxlamasının və cərimə yazmasının qarşısını ala bilərsiniz.

Proqramda test funksiyası var. Suallara cavab verməklə yol nişanları biliklərinizi test edə bilər və nəticəni dostlarınızla paylaşa bilərsiniz.

Əgər proqram xoşunuza gəldisə, xahiş edirik, dəstək olmaq üçün proqrama 5 ulduz (səs) verəsiniz. Proqramı dostlarınızla paylaşaraq onların da bu proqramdan faydalanmağına və yollardakı nişanları tanımağına kömək edin.

The Azerbaijani Quran is a beautiful translation of the Holy Quran in the Azerbaijani language, making the timeless wisdom and guidance of Islam accessible to millions of Azerbaijani people around the world.

The Azerbaijani Quran is not just about the words; it’s about connecting deeply with the teachings of Islam in a language that resonates with the heart. Whether you're a new learner or someone looking to strengthen your faith, the Azerbaijani Quran helps you understand and reflect on the messages of peace, love, and guidance that Islam offers. It's a bridge to a more personal, meaningful relationship with the Quran while still preserving the depth and beauty of the original Arabic text.

Before the Azerbaijani Quran translation, the Quran was primarily recited and taught in Arabic. However, for many Azerbaijani people, understanding the Quran’s meaning was a challenge due to the language barrier. This was the main reason behind producing translations of the Quran and other Islamic texts in Azerbaijani.

 

DAILY VERSES

● After setting the reminder, you’ll get daily notifications to read your daily Quran verses.
QURAN VIDEOS
● Here you can find many Quran videos available.
 
WALLPAPERS
● A wide variety of beautiful wallpapers are available.
QUOTES

● We have Quran quotes in the form of images and text.
 
MY LIBRARY
● My library has all the highlighted verses, notes, and bookmarks that you make.
CALENDAR
● Contains all the festival dates.
 
VERSE GRAPHICS
● Quranic verses with images are available; select and share them with friends and family on social media.

In this globalized world, overcoming language barriers has become more important. Our Translate Ease is committed to providing you with accurate and fast translation services, allowing you to easily solve any language translation problems you need, no matter where you are.

Applicable scenarios:
Travel: Whether it is a restaurant menu, traffic signs, or interactions with locals, the translation app can help you quickly understand.
Business: When communicating with multinational companies and customers, the translation app allows you to easily handle emails, documents, and calls in various languages.
Learning: A must-have for partners learning new languages, translate words, phrases, and sentences anytime, anywhere to accelerate the language learning process.
Daily life: Translate shopping tags, recipes, news, etc. to help you better understand content in different languages.

Why choose us?
High accuracy: Using advanced translation algorithms to ensure accurate translation results.
User-friendly: The simple interface design makes it easy for you to get started and quickly find the functions you need.
Fast and efficient translation experience, easily cope with various scenarios such as daily conversations, business emails, travel routes, etc.

Проверять гос номер авто важно перед покупкой машины.

Приложение «Номерограм» позволяет найти историю продаж и отдельные фото машины в Интернете по гос номеру. Пробить по гос номеру авто у нас можно бесплатно.

Установите «Номерограм». Введите в поиск гос номер, и мы найдём вам историю продажи машины или отдельные её фото из Интернета. Покажем даты размещения объявления, цену и пробег.

В нашей базе свыше 25 000 000 номеров. Фотографии в «Номерограм» приходят как от людей (можно добавить фото машины с гос номером через приложение), так и с досок объявлений, социальных сетей и других сайтов. Всё из открытых источников.

«Номерограм» найдёт для вас по гос номеру:

Пробег автомобиля.

Если автомобиль ранее размещался на авито, автору, дром и т.д., мы найдём его фотографии и покажем пробег, который указал продавец в объявлении. Наша база непрерывно пополняется. 

Цена машины.

Также мы сможем показать вам цену машины. А если она продавалась несколько раз, то вы сможете увидеть историю изменения цены. Это полезная информация, которая поможет вам поторговаться.

Город продажи.

Мы можем находить не только пробеги и цены, но и города продажи автомобиля. Всегда интересно узнать, где бегала машина ранее. 

Фото ДТП и ремонтов.

«Номерограм» мониторит не только доски объявлений, но и другие ресурсы. Поиск по номеру может помочь вам увидеть фото ДТП или процесс ремонта автомобиля.

Ещё вы можете по фото выяснить, что машина бегала в такси.

Несколько показательных примеров:

Скрутил 100 000 километров пробега — А 774 СО 716
Жёсткое ДТП, машину восстановили — А 714 НТ 38
Была в ДТП и работала в такси — Т 146 УС 56
Бесславный конец японской гонки — О 461 ЕА 125

И это не всё!

Мы хотим сделать мир лучше и помочь покупателям подержанных машин. Всё-таки приятно подстраховать себя перед покупкой авто, а не играть в лотерею. Для этого «Номерограм» и сделан.

Добавляйте фото машин с гос номерами в «Номерограм» и радости в жизни прибавится!

Assalamu alaikum to everyone. Do you recite the Holy Quran Sharif regularly? If it’s yes, then we are here to help you reciting Quran majid more convenient way.

You can just use this application to eradicate this kind of difficulty. This is how this application can help you.

Every one knows that, there are totally 6236 ayats in Al-Quran and a reader will get ten sawab for one letter of Quran. Recitation of the holy Quran Sharif: "There is no doubt that Quran Sharif is the best guide in this world". Our Quran Azərbaycan application maintains the way like the book form of Quran majeed maintains itself. So a reader might not face any problem in the time of recitation. Hence, with honour and respect, you can keep it reading through this Quran Azərbaycan application as like as you read the book of Quran Sharif before.

With this Islamic book app, you are getting Hafizi quran with real page-curl experience. This is not just a textual app, it is an audio Quran app. You can listen telwat of Quran ayats continuously (internet connection required). You can search words or topic in Azərbaycan on this Quran app. Bookmark the ayat / verse you like / quote. Share the ayat / verse you want.

MAIN FEATURES:
• Quran: The Holy Quran with audio recitations, phonetics, tafsir and translations.

Al Quran (Қуръон):

- Four juristic methods (Məzhəb): Hənəfi, Şafi, Maliki, Hənbəli.

Tasbih (Təsbih):

- Listen to the audio for each name and easy to play/pause
